titleInfo.title: Contact Prints of the National Home for Jewish Children

physicalDescription.extent: 1 photograph (16 frames), 7 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''13 Boxing: Will Blumenthal. fund raiser. Norm Nissenbaum, social worker, Will Cohen, superintendent; 14 NHJC after 1945; 15 Sunbaths in the nursery sand box; 16 Rabbi Chaim Davidovitch with children at Passover Table; 17 Mr. and Mrs. David Musman (monkey and organ grinder), costume party of Denver Ladies Auxiliary, 1939; 18 Dr. Milton Lorber and Bessie Willens c. 1942; 19.''

mods.abstract: Contact prints of 35 millimeter roll of film. Images are from the National Home for Jewish Children.

name.namePart: Denver Sheltering Home for Jewish Children (Denver, Colo.)

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
